welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Lyon, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its historic downtown, friendly community, and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Lake Street Tavern
restaurants.description: Lake Street Tavern is a american restaurant located in South Lyon.
restaurants.address: 127 E Lake St (Pontiac Trail), South Lyon, MI 48178

restaurants.name: Culver's
restaurants.description: Culver's is a fast food restaurant located in South Lyon.

restaurants.name: Aleko's
restaurants.description: Aleko's is a pizzeria located in South Lyon.

restaurants.name: Luca's Coney Island
restaurants.description: Luca's Coney Island is a american restaurant located in South Lyon.

restaurants.name: South Lyon Village Bakery
restaurants.description: South Lyon Village Bakery is a bakery located in South Lyon.
restaurants.address: 222 S Lafayette St (Elm), South Lyon, MI 48178

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is equipped with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The McNamara Terminal is the main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport and serves as the hub for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport serves as the hub for all other airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'DTW Free WiFi' network.
